sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import '../style/style.css'; import axios from 'axios'; class AddDetails extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { Uid: '', uniname: '', regDate: '', expDate: '', weburl: '', imgUrl: '', students: '', email: '', contactNo: '', weburl:'' } } onChange = e => { this.setState({ [e.target.id]: e.target.value }); }; onSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() const details = { "UID": this.state.Uid, "Uniname": this.state.uniname, "email": this.state.email, "registrationDate": this.state.regDate, "expirydate": this.state.expDate, "imageUrl": this.state.imgUrl, "Students": this.state.students, "contact": this.state.contactNo } axios.post('http://localhost:5000/kisanfeedback-b2c73/us-central1/api/add', details) .then(res => { console.log('sent'); this.props.history.push('/view'); }) .catch(err => { console.log(err) }) } render() { return (
this.onChange(e)} required />
) } } export default AddDetails;
